item.title: Infinite Runner 2D
item.description: Infinite Runner 2D is a 2D game using C Programming Language and iGraphics - An OpenGL Wrapper. The game is about a boy keeps running and running, in his way he faces two types of obsacles. He needs to jump to avoid collisin. He can throw a Kunai to destroy one kind of object. But this throwing comes at a cost, 100 point is deducted each time it is thrown.
